channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Clustering ideas with Llamafile
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: In my previous post, I used local models with PyTorch and Sentence Transformers to roughly cluster ideas by named topic. In this post, I'll try that again, but this time with Llamafile.</body></html>

item.title: Clustering ideas with local ML/AI models
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: In my previous post, I used APIs from OpenAI to roughly cluster ideas by named topic. In this post, I'll try that again, but this time with local models on my own hardware.</body></html>
